function distance($lat1, $lon1, $lat2, $lon2, $unit) { 
	  $theta = $lon1 - $lon2; 
	  $dist = sin(deg2rad($lat1)) * sin(deg2rad($lat2)) +  cos(deg2rad($lat1)) * cos(deg2rad($lat2)) * cos(deg2rad($theta)); 
	  $dist = acos($dist); 
	  $dist = rad2deg($dist); 
	  $miles = $dist * 60 * 1.1515;
	  $unit = strtoupper($unit);
	  if ($unit == ""K"") {
	    return ($miles * 1.609344); 
	  } else if ($unit == ""N"") {
	      return ($miles * 0.8684);
	    } else {
	        return $miles;
	      }
	}
